Title: Installing TEAM Mentor Eclipse Plugin for Fortify
DirectLink: Installing TEAM Mentor Eclipse Plugin for Fortify

Data:
#In the Eclipse toolbar click on  Help ->  Install New Software  and click on “Add” \\ \\
{{/Image/ecins1.jpg}} \\ \\ \\
#In the dialog box that appears enter a name (TEAM Mentor Eclipse Plugin for Fortify) in the name section and for Install Link  use: \\ \\
https://eclipse.TEAMMentor.net \\ \\
Click “OK”  \\  \\
{{/Image/ecins2.jpg}} \\ \\ \\
#Select Security Innovation TEAM Mentor Plugin for Fortify and click “Next” \\ \\
{{/Image/ecins3.jpg}} \\ \\ \\
#Confirm the items being installed.  Click “Next” \\ \\
{{/Image/ecins4.jpg}} \\ \\ \\
#Accept the license and click “Finish” \\ \\
{{/Image/ecins5.jpg}} \\ \\ \\
#Restart Eclipse when prompted \\ \\
{{/Image/ecins6.jpg}}
